<!-- ===== JS minimal : filtre des rubriques ===== -->
<script>
(function(){
  const KEY = "mogadarr.romanFilter";
  const bar = document.querySelector(".roman-filter");
  if(!bar) return;

  const buttons = bar.querySelectorAll(".chip");
  const groups  = document.querySelectorAll(".group-slab");

  function applyFilter(cat){
    groups.forEach(g => {
      const match = (cat === "all") || (g.dataset.cat === cat);
      g.style.display = match ? "" : "none";
    });
  }

  // Restore last selection
  const saved = localStorage.getItem(KEY) || "all";
  applyFilter(saved);
  buttons.forEach(b => {
    const on = b.dataset.filter === saved;
    b.classList.toggle("active", on);
    b.setAttribute("aria-pressed", on ? "true" : "false");
  });

  // Click handling
  buttons.forEach(btn => {
    btn.addEventListener("click", () => {
      const cat = btn.dataset.filter;
      applyFilter(cat);
      localStorage.setItem(KEY, cat);
      buttons.forEach(b => {
        const on = b === btn;
        b.classList.toggle("active", on);
        b.setAttribute("aria-pressed", on ? "true" : "false");
      });
    });
  });
})();
</script>
